TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpChannel extends System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiverHook, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel
Public Class HttpChannel Inherits BaseChannelWithProperties Implements IChannel, IChannelReceiver, IChannelReceiverHook, IChannelSender, ISecurableChannel
type HttpChannel = class inherit BaseChannelWithProperties interface IChannelReceiver interface IChannel interface IChannelSender interface IChannelReceiverHook interface ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 为远程调用实现使用 HTTP 协议传输消息的客户端信道。

span.span: Implements a client channel for remote calls that uses the HTTP protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信道跨越远程处理边界 （例如，计算机或应用程序域） 之间传输消息。Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, between computers or application domains). 类将使用 HTTP 协议的消息传输。The class transports messages using the HTTP protocol. .NET Framework 远程处理基础结构使用的通道来传输远程调用。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 当客户端发出对远程对象的调用时，调用将被序列化为一条消息是由客户端通道发送和接收的服务器信道。When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 然后，它是反序列化和处理。It is then deserialized and processed. 任何返回的值是由服务器信道传输和接收客户端通道。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 一个对象具有关联的配置属性，可以在设置配置文件中运行时 (通过调用静态方法) 或以编程方式 (通过传递集合构造函数）。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 有关这些配置属性的列表，请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For a list of these configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用设置远程处理服务器和其客户端。The following code example shows how to use a to set up a remoting server and its client. 此示例包含三个部分：The example contains three parts: - 一台服务器A server - 客户端A client - 在服务器和客户端使用的远程对象A remote object used by the server and the client 下面的代码示例显示了服务器。The following code example shows a server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CPP/server.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CS/server.cs#40)] 下面的代码示例显示了此服务器的客户端。The following code example shows a client for this server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CPP/client.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CS/client.cs#10)] 下面的代码示例显示了使用服务器和客户端的远程对象。The following code example shows the remote object used by the server and the client. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CPP/common.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CS/common.cs#30)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider clientSinkProvider, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider serverSinkProvider) cil managed
Public Sub New (properties As IDictionary, clientSinkProvider As IClientChannelSinkProvider, serverSinkProvider As IServerChannelSinkProvider)

param.name: properties
param.span: 一个 集合，它为客户端和服务器信道要使用的配置属性指定值。

span.span: A collection that specifies values for configuration properties to be used by the client and server channels.

param.name: clientSinkProvider
param.span: 客户端信道要使用的 实现。

span.span: The implementation to be used by the client channel.

param.name: serverSinkProvider
param.span: 服务器信道要使用的 实现。

span.span: The implementation to be used by the server channel.

summary.span: 使用指定的配置属性和接收器初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified configuration properties and sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通道配置属性的详细信息，请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). 信道接收器提供允许访问基础消息流经该通道，以及传输机制用于将消息发送到远程对象的流的插件点。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 信道接收器也要负责在客户端和服务器之间传输消息。Channel sinks are also responsible for transporting messages between the client and the server. 信道接收器链中链接在一起，所有信道消息流过此接收器链之前最终序列化和传输消息。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain, and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is finally serialized and transported. 如果不需要接收器功能，设置`clientSinkProvider`并`serverSinkProvider`参数`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `clientSinkProvider` and `serverSinkProvider` parameters to `null`.

exception.span: 配置属性的格式设置不正确。

span.span: A configuration property was incorrectly formatted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个已注册的信道都有唯一的名称。Every registered channel has a unique name. 该名称用于在调用时检索特定的信道。The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelPriority As Integer
public: property int ChannelPriority { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前信道的优先级。

span.span: Gets the priority of the current channel.

value.span: 一个整数，表示分配给该信道的优先级。

span.span: An integer that represents the priority assigned to the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 优先级将控制在其中相互竞争的客户端连接到给定终结点; 的顺序更高优先级通道所连接之前较低优先级通道。The priority controls the order in which competing clients connect to a given endpoint; higher priority channels connect before lower priority channels. 默认优先级为 1;允许使用负的优先级。The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelScheme As String

span.span: The type of listener to hook into.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前属性的值不区分大小写。The value of the current property is not case-sensitive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信道接收器提供允许访问基础消息流经该通道，以及传输机制用于将消息发送到远程对象的流的插件点。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 信道接收器链接在一起的信道接收器提供程序链中之前，所有信道消息流经此接收器链最终序列化和传输消息。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of channel sink providers and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is finally serialized and transported.

summary.span: 返回将消息传送到指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回将消息传送到指定的 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。The method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or the channel data object. 如果`uri`参数是`null`，`remoteChannelData`用作接收器的目标。If the `uri` parameter is `null`, `remoteChannelData` is used as a target for the sink. 要么`url`或`remoteChannelData`参数可以是`null`，但不可同时使用两者。Either the `url` or `remoteChannelData` parameters can be `null`, but not both. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
